OpusClip Overview

edit
What is OpusClip?

OpusClip is the #1 AI video editing tool that turns a long video into viral shorts in one click. Trusted by 2M+ creators and 1M+ businesses, including dozens of Fortune 500 companies, OpusClip helps companies grow their social presence and business through viral shorts. OpusClip exhibits human-level performance on various video creation and editing benchmarks. It uses a proprietary hook-identifying model powered by GPT-4 to pick out the most valuable hook from your video, rearrange the content to add context and depth to that hook, and produce a structured, impactful clip that captures your audience's attention.

G2 reviews are authentic and verified.
Here's how.
We strive to keep our reviews authentic.
G2 reviews are an important part of the buying process, and we understand the value they provide to both our customers and buyers. To ensure the value is retained, it's important to make certain that reviews are authentic and trustworthy, which is why G2 requires verified methods to write a review and validates the reviewer's identity before approving. G2 validates the reviewers identity with our moderation process that prevents inauthentic reviews, and we strive to collect reviews in a responsible and ethical manner.

"Quick and easy video editing tool"
What do you like best about OpusClip?

I like how much time Opus saves the user while still developing a professional product. I think it's a game changer with all the tools it offers including AI, and it customizes videos like captions and formats very well. I like how easy it is to edit these clips. I'm able to remove any awkward moments by eliminating pauses, filler words, etc. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you dislike about OpusClip?

Opus has several things being beta tested including the AI features. I like how I can use AI to create B-roll but often times the B-roll doesn't project the tone I'm looking for. The AI is also very slow. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What problems is OpusClip solving and how is that benefiting you?

Quickly and easily make video edits. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

Jul 12, 2024
"fantastic concept, poor execution"
What do you like best about OpusClip?

I love the concept and ease of being able to drag my YouTube link and get instant content. It's super appealing and is the reason I'm sure everyone else has signed up. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you dislike about OpusClip?

The execution of OpusClip is extremely lacking. The clips it pulls are really hit or miss. If it generates 20 clips, maybe two or three are ready to go. I'm talking baseline quality standards, like the subtitles accurately reflecting what was said, the cut making sense, or the framing of the video being centered. By the time I finish fixing the things that don't look right in the clip, I've spent as much, if not more, time than I would have creating the clip by myself in Premiere. The only thing it really saves me time on is sourcing the clip, but as I said, the quality of the placements of clips is so poor that even that isn't really helpful in many cases. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What problems is OpusClip solving and how is that benefiting you?

I create a lot of social media content for both my podcasts and other podcast that I've worked with and using Opus clip should in theory assist in that process Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

"This is a Social Media Timesaver!"
What do you like best about OpusClip?

Been using OpusClip as a Pro user for about two months. This is an incredible timesaver! I typically upload a 12-15 video daily and out pop 10-15 clips ranging from 30 seconds to two minutes (using the auto settings), Each is branded with colors and a logo of my choosing.

The whole process is so easy â€” even editing takes very little time. I just download and post away. (I haven't used the posting tools built in.) Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you dislike about OpusClip?

Two things are annoying. First, I've tried using OpusClips for videos with a moving speaker and it just doesn't work. I can split frames and position the speaker, but that's tedious andOpus is supposed to do this automatically.

Second, editied captions don't always sync with the video. Sometimes words will show up in captions that aren't in the audio; other times the audio still plays when I deleted words from the captions. Probably 85-90% accuracy in this area. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What problems is OpusClip solving and how is that benefiting you?

If it weren't for OpusClip, I wouldn't be creating short-form video content at all. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

Amelia W.
Mid-Market(51-1000 emp.)
  • Report a Concern
Validated Reviewer
Verified Current User
Review source: Organic
Mar 13, 2024
"A handy tool for beginners, but it could be better"
What do you like best about OpusClip?

The main benefit of OpusClip is that you can quickly create short branded videos to share across social platforms.

The captions functionality is great. It generates very accurate subtitles and you can very easily edit them (though this is rarely necessary) and change the font, colour, and positioning.

It's also great that you can save up to five branded templates. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you dislike about OpusClip?

Often, the clips that OpusClip produces have odd frames in between sections of video. These look a bit janky and are very hard to remove as editing functionalities are limited.

Another thing I often find frustrating is that the video keeps playing at full speed while you're editing it, so while you're trying to change one part of the video, it moves to another.

I see that a fully revamped editor is soon to be rolled out. Hopefully, this will make things easier. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What problems is OpusClip solving and how is that benefiting you?

It's solving the problem of asking video teams to break down videos into shorter clips. With OpusClip, I can do it by myself and quickly extract the maximum value from our videos. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

Mar 08, 2024
"Efficient and Powerful Tool I Use to Streamline my Social Media Content Creation Process"
What do you like best about OpusClip?

I love how easily I am able to turn my long form content into short form content. Short form content is taking over as far as what brings people in to your programming, however, long form content still dominates as the most entertaining type of project. Being able to produce the long form content as we always have and then have this easy way to share it in the more modern short-form format is a game changer. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you dislike about OpusClip?

One of the biggest downsides for me is the limitation when I am creating a short - the program decides what section of script I can cut from but sometimes I wish I could choose more before or after what I have. Along with that, AI remains imperfect. I can't put product in and have it ready for release without additional editing, however, the time saving is totally worthwhile. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What problems is OpusClip solving and how is that benefiting you?

Time Time Time. We're a small video production company trying to keep up with the trends. We have several projects going on all at once that all require a social media presence. Our small team just doesn't have the time in the day to be watching hours of content and choosing parts to use for social meda. Opus cuts that time out of the equation so we can easily prep social videos and use them to great effect Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.
